review: I keep telling those other guys to stop calling me. After 18yrs of a satellite provider and we all know Directly who, the bill kept creeping up for one thing or another. I saw all these cheaper rates they were offering to new business but not rewarding old reliable business so I got rid of them and got an antenna that reaches over 70 miles, wow all my local channels are free. Then I got this firestick, AWESOME! I can watch what I want to watch and if I want to watch. Some show I may have to pay 1,99 to see them but its still at my leasure and the best part, I am not paying 1200.00 a yr anymore for the same thing. lol Now Direct keeps calling trying to get me back, they had their chance before I went this way. I love it! I am totally happy and with my Prime membership its a double bonus. I get lots of other things along with my prime besides movies and television shows. I get free music, I can watch a whole season of my favorite shows for free, now hooked on Downton Abbey, lol and Reign.  I am still exploring all the fun things I am getting with Amazon Prime and Fire stick. I highly recomjmend it.

review: This is a great gadget. Bought it when Amazon was selling it "pre-ordered" for $19.00. The speed is awesome for such a small gadget. The wireless speed is amazing... My TV (Sony) has built-in wireless (very crappy) this gadget is at least 4 to 5 times faster. Movies never chop or lag. TV is on a different floor, and about two additional walls away. Wireless speed is awesome.HERE IS WHY I WONT GIVE IT A 5 STARS... even though it deserves it.... The bigger brother has a voice search feature that is second to none. WELL... Amazon can sell you the remote SEPARATELY for this unit... why not offer a model with a voice search equipped remote for a few extra dollars.I must also point out that I don't care much for the voice remote search, but my wife and kids really like it. I might have to buy it for an additional $20.00 to $30.00 (I think)Highly recommended. Very fast. The cover flow when showing the movies cover is the smoothest I have seen.
author: Ralph Montague "R. Montague"
